summary: Ever wanted to take Eola with you on an epic adventure but just could not because she was to damn ugly? Well look no further!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, it\'s a retexture of Eola using Skyrim NPC Editor by foretrenty.
It only contains a mesh and a texture file together with the .esp-file


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Why?[/b]

I wanted to have Eola with me because she\'s very versitile. She is good with One-handed, Light armour, Destruction and alteration as well as Sneak. She can back you up almost regardless of the class you\'re playing.

However i never chose her because i could not stand her damn face. She looked like a hobo rather than a hot crazy cannibal chick that would persuade you to \"go lay down for a while\" without any use of magic. I\'m quite pleased with the result.

I used Astrid as my reference, but they do not look like clones - rather like sisters. And it makes sense in a way: one kills for business and the other kills for pleasure...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]If you want her to have as pretty clothes as she has on the picture, i recommend the reskin-mod for the Dark Brotherhood armour:[/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6249

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Update:[/b]

You should really download the final version if you downloaded a previous one, this fixes the issue with Mourners Clothes hat that never comes off unless you use a helmet to cover it. Apart from that, nicer eyes and should be no more dressing up problems. If you downloaded it before, follow the uninstall instructions and then extract either the Dark-eyed version or the normal version - Do NOT extract both..

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Installing:[/b]

To install this, simply download the files and extract everything in your skyrim \"Data\"-folder.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Uninstalling:[/b]

If you do not wish to use it any more, simply un-click the \"RedoneEola\" in your mod-manager of choice and remove these two files:

skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm\\0001990f.nif
skyrim\\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facetint\\skyrim.esm\\0001990f.dds


I hope you will enjoy it :)
author: Malware
